body.description: Signature by Levi Strauss & Co.™ Women's Heritage High Rise Loose Straight Jeans are a vintage look that's right on-trend. The high waist and loose leg give you some breathing room, while the soft, stretchy, vintage-inspired fabric flexes and moves with you. Whether you dress them up or down, you've got lots of shoe options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice jeans at a good price
reviews.reviewText: I just received these today (much more quickly than expected.) I tried them on right away and they felt really comfortable. Perfect in fact. Not too tight or loose and not too much stretch. Nice and sturdy.I'm going to return them though because they're a little too short. I have long legs [5'8, 171 lbs] and would prefer to wear them with low-heeled boots. If they were fitted at the ankles instead of a straight semi-wide leg they would work. As is, they stick out at the sides and show too much of the shoe. I bought the gray to add a different color to my wardrobe but that didn't work for me either. Nice jeans though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit for Plus Size! Still, size down one size unless you’re very Apple shaped.
reviews.reviewText: Plus Size gals, these are for us…really! I wish they had more extended sizing because these are flattering and comfortable. I usually avoid wide leg but am so glad I clicked! These are slimming. They look like my mom’s jeans from the 70s (which she wore through the ‘90s and I can see why)! An actual woman can fit in these things. I’m usually a Size 20. I order up and get a 22 if a brand runs small. I hesitantly ordered Size 18 after reading reviews. They are a bit big through the waist and belly, and my shape is what I call a rounded pear (the round part starts just below my bust). I’m wearing thick waffle weave long johns and could fit 2 more pairs on, so I’m keeping them for October-April in the Upper Midwest US. I’m going to try a 16 (?!?) for the rest of the year. I also want them in black. The light blue color (something River?) isn’t as light as it looks online and I’m grateful! I got them because it was the only color available. I wanted a medium or dark blue and I hope they make them, but these don’t make me look giant. They really have that ‘70s-early ‘80s vintage look. Some people said ‘90s but I don’t see it, but I was in the G-brand. My style (and body) has gone from hard to soft, and I love the coverage, relaxed fit, and feminine styling. I often have to return things because the waist is small, and I have never been so comfortable sitting in jeans. I’m not sure if these are great for apple shapes with slender legs, but for those who carry their weight in the middle and lower as well, these are amazing! I like the slight bell bottom. I only keep one pair of wider bells because they don’t look right with most of my tops. I’m a convert, and I hope to have a closet full of these. Bye, skinny jeans and marmy pants! I’m literally canceling some other orders right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The jeans are a good 3-4 inches longer than they should be for a size 18 woman's ave length jean.
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are soft and seam well made. They are VERY long. A good 3-4 inches long. They are also a bit larger than I expected. I am going to keep them and hem them, as they appear flattering and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: I'm '5"9 and 130lbs, these are perfect for my long legs. They are beyond comfortable and are cute and stylish while modest and loose!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way too long, unfortunately
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'5" and ordered size 8. The waist and hips fit great but the jeans are way too long for my legs, even with boots. Someone here said they were 33"-34" inseam. I wish it was stated somewhere in the description. If you are tall or if you are not too lazy to hem them, the jeans look great, have quite a bit of stretch, and are comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems different color has a different fit?
reviews.reviewText: I wish this info had been in the displayed comments, alas, if it was I did not see it, so please find this helpful and maybe it will remain in the upper regions of comments for everyone. I am not a poster of pictures at all, but this was all a bit off, so here we go:I bought these in black, two pairs even, and I love them. I love the fabric, the fit, the high waist, the full legs, the pockets, the length, everything. So now to diversify my color options--I buy the same size---just a different color. Nice color, beautiful soft faded blue, just lovely. Eagerly awaited their arrival, etc. Put them on and dang--just too tight to be right. So I measure them up against my fine fitting black pants that have been washed even. The new blue pants, see the picture, almost 2 inches smaller in the waist, ouch! That doesn't work for me. Stuck my hand in the pocket and oddly, not the place I would imagine you would save material, the front pockets are only about 4 inches deep! What's the big idea there? I wouldn't carry cash there, maybe a toothpick? (sideways only) So here's my hands in the pockets, and then the measuring tape for the visual, since I'm doing pictures anyway.These are great pants, and I will try again. I wish there were more colors and the availability was better and the shipping time was faster, but thankfully they are here! Wish me luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE these pants.
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and fit of these pants; however, I did have to have them hemmed about an inch and a half. So what, they fit great and are super comfortable. I am going to see if I can order another pair in a different color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars it’s not for the short girls
reviews.reviewText: super cute! fits great around my waist, hugs me perfectly but not too tight! i love the worth the money! my mother took a little off the bottom, im 5’ and they’re the best jeans!

reviews.reviewTitle: Waist fits, has good stretch, i sized down I take 29 in premiums
reviews.reviewText: Cute - getting into the new non skinny style of pant
Both pockets were quite frayed. Do not recommend if you are not looking for the well-worn look (I wasn't).

I ordered a size 4 as I usually take a size 27 in Levi jeans however, Amazon sent me a size 2 and they fit perfect. Thank you Amazon haha. I do like my jeans a little baggy for reference I’m 5’5”and 125 pounds and I’m in my 50s. I think these jeans are so flattering although I don’t know if I would get them if I had a flat butt, it might emphasize this. The material is thick and seems to be of good quality. I am on the slim side so I like that they seem to give some shape. I love the high waste they are so flattering in my opinion. They will look great with a pointy low heel bootie

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Quality Plus Sizes Available Stretchy Fit Jeans
reviews.reviewText: They have stretch to them! If you want a curve hugging fit then go 1 or 2 sizes down— if you like a relaxed fit, stick with your size! I got my usual plus size, size 18, but I’m getting a smaller pair to be less loose. Good quality jeans overall.
